SEARCH
Package com.app.service

Interface OrderService

All Superinterfaces:
CrudService<Order>
All Known Implementing Classes:
OrderServiceImpl
public interface OrderService extends CrudService<Order>
Interface for managing orders. Extends the CrudService interface to inherit basic CRUD operations for Order entities. In addition to the basic CRUD operations, this service provides methods for adding single or multiple orders.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    Long
    addOrder(OrderAddDto orderAddDto)
    Adds a new order.
    List<Long>
    addOrders(OrdersAddDto ordersAddDto)
    Adds multiple orders.

    • addOrder

      Adds a new order.
      Parameters:
      orderAddDto - the DTO containing the order data to be added
      Returns:
      the ID of the newly added order

    • addOrders

      List<Long> addOrders(OrdersAddDto ordersAddDto)
      Adds multiple orders.
      Parameters:
      ordersAddDto - the DTO containing the list of orders to be added
      Returns:
      a list of IDs of the newly added orders
